definition.name: Drawer
definition.description: A root component that creates a drawer interface using the Vaul library. The drawer is a panel that slides in from the edge of the screen, typically used for navigation menus, filters, or additional content.

shouldScaleBackground.description: Controls whether the background should scale when the drawer is opened

definition.name: DrawerTrigger
definition.description: A button component that triggers the drawer to open when clicked.

definition.name: DrawerPortal
definition.description: A portal component that renders the drawer content at the root of the document, ensuring proper stacking context and accessibility.

definition.name: DrawerClose
definition.description: A button component that closes the drawer when clicked.

definition.name: DrawerOverlay
definition.description: A semi-transparent overlay that covers the entire screen when the drawer is open. Provides visual focus on the drawer content.
definition.visualLayout: Fixed position overlay covering the entire viewport with a semi-transparent black background

definition.name: DrawerContent
definition.description: The container component that holds the drawer's content. It slides up from the bottom of the screen and includes a visual handle for dragging.
definition.visualLayout: Fixed position container at the bottom of the screen with rounded top corners, a border, and a draggable handle indicator. Content is arranged in a flex column layout.

definition.name: DrawerHeader
definition.description: A container component for the drawer's header content, typically containing the title and description. Features responsive text alignment.
definition.visualLayout: Grid container with gap spacing and padding, text centered on mobile and left-aligned on desktop

definition.name: DrawerFooter
definition.description: A container component for the drawer's footer content, typically used for actions or buttons. Automatically positions itself at the bottom of the drawer.
definition.visualLayout: Flex container with column direction and padding, positioned at the bottom of the drawer content

definition.name: DrawerTitle
definition.description: A heading component for the drawer's title. Features larger text size, semibold weight, and tight letter spacing.

definition.name: DrawerDescription
definition.description: A text component for providing additional details or context within the drawer. Styled with muted foreground color and smaller text size.
examples: <DrawerDescription>This is a description of the drawer content.</DrawerDescription>
